RelatedSentence: When a recent episode of Oishinbo , a popular Japanese manga series , hit stands Monday it included a controversial panel featuring characters that suffer nose bleeds due to radiation caused by the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear power plant disaster of 2011 .

The cooking - themed comic book - which has now been suspended indefinitely - runs in Big Comic Spirits magazine and is authored by Tetsu Kariya , whose numerous visits to the plant compelled him to pen the story .
